mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY(P_ID, P_MER, MB_ID, P_DATE, EXH_TITLE, BUYER, BUYER_EMAIL, BUYER_TEL, AMOUNT, EXH_NO, EXH_IMG) VALUES( #{p_id}, #{p_mer}, #{mb_id}, #{p_date}, #{exh_title}, #{buyer}, #{buyer_email}, #{buyer_tel}, #{amount}, #{exh_no}, #{exh_img})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*,e.exh_end_date FROM PAY P, MEMBER MB, exhibition e WHERE 1=1 AND P.MB_ID=MB.MB_ID AND P.MB_ID = #{mb_id} AND p.EXH_TITLE = e.EXH_TITLE ORDER BY P_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM PAY P, EXHIBITION E WHERE 1=1 AND buyer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND buyer_tel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND p_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER BY P_DATE DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT Count(*) FROM PAY WHERE 1=1 AND buyer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND buyer_tel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') AND p_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
SELECT *, COUNT(p.P_ID)AS rank_cnt from exhibition as e LEFT outer JOIN pay AS p on e.exh_no= p.exh_no GROUP BY e.exh_no ORDER BY p.exh_no DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT SUM(rank_cnt)FROM( SELECT e.*, COUNT(p.P_ID)AS rank_cnt from exhibition as e LEFT outer JOIN pay AS p on e.exh_no= p.exh_no GROUP BY e.exh_no ORDER BY p.exh_no DESC LIMIT 3 )a;
